original_text: You took some of your garments to make gaudy high places, where you carried on your prostitution. You went to him, and he possessed your beauty.
korean_text: 네가 네 의복을 가지고 너를 위하여 각색으로 산당을 꾸미고 거기에서 행음하였나니 이런 일은 전무후무하니라

sentences.original_text: You took some of your garments
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 옷 중에서 일부를 가져다가

sentences.original_text: where you carried on your prostitution
